    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor owner)
      The menu description of UpgradableActions is checked everytime if the upgrade is not null before displaying the option of upgrading.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class GameWeapon
      Parameters:
      owner - the owner of the weapon.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions which either contains actions or empty list
